Listen on usb port (using free device monitoring studio)
hdkcom.exe -port COM14 460800 -uart -r 39 -record 1 rec_ref_record.bit

wr: 0x61 0x00 0x04 0x04 0x00 0x02 0x2F 0x2D
rd: 0x61 0x00 0x01 0x04 0x01

wr: 0x61 0x00 0x11 0x00 0x10 0x00 0x32 0x00 0x40 0x0B 0x07 0x09 0x27 0x05 0x18 0x40 0x15 0x00 0x01 0x2F 0x37
rd: 0x61 0x00 0x10 0x00 0x10 0x00 0x32 0x00 0x40 0x00 0x0B 0x00 0x09 0x00 0x05 0x00 0x15 0x00 0x2F 0x4F

wr: 0x61 0x00 0x0A 0x00 0x44 0x03 0x80 0x02 0xA0 0x49 0x00 0x0A 0x2F 0x03
rd: 0x61 0x00 0x06 0x00 0x44 0x00 0x49 0x00 0x2F 0x24

wr: 0x61 0x00 0x04 0x00 0x2A 0x00 0x2F 0x01
rd: 0x61 0x00 0x04 0x00 0x2A 0x00 0x2F 0x01

//start - audio file
rd: 61 00 10 01 01 48 CD 98 A1 53 E9 E9 39 7D 00 02 00 02 2F 94
wr: 61 00 12 01 01 48 CD 98 A1 53 E9 E9 39 7D 00 03 A0 02 10 48 2F 6F

rd: 61 00 10 01 01 48 8D 89 B1 53 EB AD F2 5D 3B 02 00 00 2F 41
wr: 61 00 12 01 01 48 8D 89 B1 53 EB AD F2 5D 3B 03 A0 02 10 48 2F B8

rd: 61 00 10 01 01 48 8D 98 A1 53 AB AD F2 5D 3B 02 00 00 2F 00
wr: 61 00 12 01 01 48 8D 98 A1 53 AB AD F2 5D 3B 03 A0 02 10 48 2F F9

rd: 61 00 10 01 01 48 8D 98 A1 52 BB 8D F2 5D 3A 02 00 00 2F 30
wr: 61 00 12 01 01 48 8D 98 A1 52 BB 8D F2 5D 3A 03 A0 02 10 48 2F C9

rd: 61 00 10 01 01 48 8C 89 B0 53 EB 8D F2 5D 3A 02 00 00 2F 60
wr: 61 00 12 01 01 48 8C 89 B0 53 EB 8D F2 5D 3A 03 A0 02 10 48 2F 99

//continue - audio file

rd: 61 00 10 01 01 48 CD 99 A1 46 F5 07 56 0B 2A 02 00 00 2F 43
wr: 61 00 12 01 01 48 CD 99 A1 46 F5 07 56 0B 2A 03 A0 02 10 48 2F BA
//end - audio file
